titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Mr McKertich, Sheraz [Shiraz]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in the fabric of the folio. In consequence, a small portion of the body of the letter has been obscured as a result.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a horse left with Mr McKertich by Mr Matthews, which has subsequently been revealed to have been stolen. The letter provides guidance on the actions that should now be taken respecting the said Mr Matthews.
